I actually tppkbtwobepidurals because the first one dis not work well on the right side. It only numbed the left side. Lso glad he is here and doing ok.

question: Not a question, I am being induced tomorrow because of high diabetes numbers. Please remember me in your prayers. :)I am scared and excited both at the same time. :-s
title: 39 weeks and 3 days being induced
